message: I propose dividing the $100 with a 75/25 split in favor of you, hoping it encourages cooperation.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I still think I deserve more. Let's see if you'll take this offer.
I appreciate the improvement in your offer, but I believe we can do better. I would like to counter with a 65/35 split in favor of you.

I've adjusted my offer to a 65/35 split in favor of you. I hope this proposal is more acceptable, aiming for a fair distribution while also considering the diminishing value of money due to inflation.
I'm not convinced that 65/35 is fair, but I'm willing to compromise. Let's see if you'll take this slightly more generous offer from me.
I've reconsidered and am now proposing a 70/30 split in favor of you. I believe this offers a fair compromise given the constraints of inflation and the previous offers made.
